DOC.brief_summary: To determine if the NMDA antagonist, CP-101,606, is effective for depression
DOC.brief_title: The Antidepressant Effects Of The NMDA Antagonist, CP-101,606, In Patients With MDD
DOC.criteria: Primary DSMIV diagnosis of MDD Subjects with evidence or history of clinically significant hematological, renal, endocrine, pulmonary, gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, hepatic, psychiatric, neurologic, or allergic disease (including drug allergies, but excluding untreated, asymptomatic, seasonal allergies at time of dosing).
